name: Union Guard
text:
You can shuffle up to 3 of your banished Union monsters into the Deck and apply the appropriate effect based on the amount shuffled:
● 1: Destroy 1 Spell/Trap card on the field.
● 2: Destroy 1 monster on the field.
● 3: Banish 1 card on the field or in the GY./nYou can only activate 1 "Union Guard" per turn.
